onboarding_setup.response:
🚀 **Onboarding & Setup:**

**What is Movic Steps?**
Movic Steps is a comprehensive step tracking app that helps you monitor your daily activity, set goals, and stay motivated on your fitness journey.

**Account Required?**
No account required! Movic Steps works completely offline and locally on your device.

**Required Permissions:**
• Motion & Fitness access (for step counting)
• HealthKit access (for data sync with Apple Health)

**How to Enable:**
1. Go to iPhone Settings > Privacy & Security > Motion & Fitness
2. Enable "Movic Steps"
3. Go to Settings > Privacy & Security > Health
4. Enable all permissions for Movic Steps

**Offline Support:**
Yes! Movic Steps works completely offline. Data syncs when you're back online.

**Compatibility:**
• iOS 16.0 or later
• iPhone and iPad supported
• No Apple Watch required (but supported if available)

step_counting.response:
📱 **Step Counting & Accuracy:**

**How it works:**
• Uses iPhone's built-in motion sensors (Core Motion framework)
• Detects walking patterns and movement
• Highly accurate when phone is in pocket or bag

**Accuracy Tips:**
• Keep phone in pocket for best results
• Avoid carrying in hand while walking
• Treadmill and elliptical steps count
• Stairs and elevation are included

**Why Different from Apple Health:**
• Different detection algorithms
• Normal to have small variations
• Both are accurate in their own way

**Refresh Rate:**
• Updates every few minutes
• Real-time step counting
• Syncs with HealthKit automatically

**Calibration:**
• Adjust stride length in settings
• Enable calculated metrics
• Auto-calibration available

**Troubleshooting:**
• Check Motion & Fitness permissions
• Ensure phone is in pocket
• Restart app if steps stop updating

goal_management.response:
🎯 **Goals, Streaks & Achievements:**

**Setting Goals:**
• Tap "Add New Goal" in Goals tab
• Choose from: Steps, Distance, Calories, Active Minutes
• Use quick presets or enter custom values
• Set daily, weekly, or monthly targets

**Editing Goals:**
• Tap the pencil icon on any goal card
• Or swipe left and tap "Edit"
• Modify target value and save

**Deleting Goals:**
• Tap the trash icon on any goal card
• Or swipe left and tap "Delete"
• Confirm deletion (cannot be undone)

**Streaks:**
• Automatic streak tracking
• Visual streak indicators
• Streak protection available
• Pause streaks when needed

**Achievements:**
• Unlock badges for milestones
• Achievement history in Insights
• Progress celebrations
• Share achievements

**Goal Types Available:**
• Steps: 1,000 - 100,000
• Distance: 0.1 - 100 km (or 60 miles)
• Calories: 50 - 2,000
• Active Minutes: 5 - 480

healthkit_integration.response:
🏥 **HealthKit & Data Sync:**

**Permissions Required:**
• Read: Steps, Distance, Active Energy Burned
• Write: Steps, Distance, Active Energy Burned

**How to Enable:**
1. Go to iPhone Settings > Privacy & Security > Health
2. Find "Movic Steps" in the list
3. Enable all permissions
4. Restart the app if needed

**Data Syncing:**
• Automatic sync with HealthKit
• Data appears in Apple Health app
• Works with other fitness apps
• Offline data syncs when online

**Manual Refresh:**
• Pull down on main screen
• Force refresh in settings
• Restart app if needed

**Data Export:**
• Export to CSV format
• Available in settings
• Includes all historical data
• Compatible with Excel/Google Sheets

**Import Past Data:**
• Automatically imports from HealthKit
• Shows historical trends
• No manual import needed

**Troubleshooting:**
• Check permissions in Settings
• Restart the app
• Ensure HealthKit is enabled
• Force refresh data if needed

calorie_calculations.response:
🔥 **Calorie & Active Minute Calculations:**

**Calorie Calculation:**
• Based on walking speed, step length, and distance
• Enable "Use Calculated Metrics" in settings
• More personalized than generic estimates
• Formula: Uses your walking patterns for accuracy
• Includes weight and height factors

**Active Minutes:**
• Time spent in moderate to vigorous activity
• Calculated from movement patterns
• Includes walking, running, and other activities
• Updates in real-time
• Based on intensity levels

**Walking Parameters:**
• Walking Speed: Adjust for your pace
• Step Length: Calibrate for accuracy
• Use Calculated Metrics: Enable for better estimates
• Auto-calibration available

**Accuracy Factors:**
• Stride length calibration
• Walking speed adjustment
• Elevation changes
• Movement intensity
• Personal body metrics

**Settings:**
• Go to Settings > Walking Parameters
• Adjust walking speed and step length
• Enable calculated metrics for better accuracy
• Calibrate with known distances

**Tips for Accuracy:**
• Keep phone in pocket for best results
• Calibrate your step length
• Enable calculated metrics
• Update weight/height in settings

notifications_reminders.response:
🔔 **Notifications & Reminders:**

**Goal Reminders:**
• Enable in Settings > Notifications
• Choose reminder times: Morning, Noon, Afternoon, Evening
• Customize reminder frequency
• Get notified when close to goal

**Notification Types:**
• Goal completion celebrations
• Daily progress updates
• Weekly summary reports
• Achievement notifications
• Streak reminders

**Customization:**
• Change reminder times in settings
• Enable/disable specific notifications
• Mute notifications temporarily
• Customize notification sounds

**Troubleshooting:**
• Check notification permissions
• Ensure Do Not Disturb is off
• Check iOS notification settings
• Restart app if needed
• Verify notification center settings

**Settings Location:**
• Go to Settings tab
• Tap "Notifications"
• Adjust all notification preferences
• Test notifications to ensure they work

apple_watch_wearables.response:
⌚ **Apple Watch & Wearables:**

**Apple Watch Support:**
• Full Apple Watch app available
• Standalone step tracking
• Complications for quick viewing
• Heart rate integration
• Workout tracking

**Data Sync:**
• Apple Watch steps appear in Movic Steps
• Automatic sync with iPhone
• No manual intervention needed
• Real-time updates

**iPhone Requirement:**
• Need iPhone nearby for full features
• Some features work standalone
• Data syncs when connected
• Bluetooth connection required

**Third-Party Wearables:**
• Sync through HealthKit
• Compatible with most fitness trackers
• Data appears in Movic Steps
• No direct integration needed

**Setup:**
• Install Movic Steps on Apple Watch
• Enable HealthKit permissions
• Data syncs automatically
• Check watch app for updates

**Troubleshooting:**
• Ensure watch is paired
• Check HealthKit permissions
• Restart both devices
• Verify Bluetooth connection

battery_performance.response:
🔋 **Battery & Performance:**

**Battery Usage:**
• Minimal battery impact
• Optimized for efficiency
• Uses system step counting
• No constant GPS usage

**Optimization Tips:**
• Keep Background App Refresh enabled
• Close other fitness apps
• Update to latest version
• Restart app occasionally

**Low Power Mode:**
• Still tracks steps accurately
• May reduce update frequency
• Core functionality maintained
• Battery life extended

**Background Refresh:**
• Required for accurate tracking
• Minimal battery usage
• Updates in background
• Essential for step counting

**Performance Tips:**
• Close unused apps
• Restart iPhone weekly
• Keep iOS updated
• Clear app cache if needed

**Monitoring:**
• Check battery usage in Settings
• Monitor app performance
• Report issues if found
• Contact support for problems

privacy_security.response:

• No personal identity information

**Data Storage:**

• Encrypted with iOS security
• Not sent to external servers

• No third-party sharing
• Apple's privacy standards

**Data Sharing:**
• We never sell your data
• No sharing with third parties
• No advertising tracking

**Data Deletion:**

• Reset app to factory state
• Remove from HealthKit
• Complete data removal

**Privacy Policy:**

• Terms of service included
• Regular updates
• Transparent practices

**Your Rights:**
• Full data control
• Export your data
• Delete anytime
• No data retention

tips_best_practices.response:
💡 **Tips & Best Practices:**

**Daily Goal Recommendations:**
• Start with 5,000-8,000 steps
• Gradually increase to 10,000+
• Listen to your body
• Adjust based on fitness level

**Hitting 10,000 Steps:**
• Take stairs instead of elevators
• Park farther from entrances
• Walk during phone calls
• Take walking breaks at work
• Walk after meals

**Desk Job Tips:**
• Set hourly step reminders
• Use standing desk if possible
• Walk during lunch breaks
• Take the long way to meetings
• Use bathroom on different floors

**Improving Accuracy:**
• Keep phone in pocket
• Calibrate step length
• Enable calculated metrics
• Update personal info
• Use consistent placement

**Weight Loss Goals:**
• Combine with calorie tracking
• Set realistic step targets
• Increase gradually
• Monitor progress
• Celebrate milestones

**Motivation Tips:**
• Set achievable goals
• Track progress daily
• Join challenges
• Share achievements
• Use reminders effectively

troubleshooting.response:
🔧 **Troubleshooting:**

**Steps Not Updating:**
1. Check Motion & Fitness permissions
2. Restart the app
3. Ensure phone is in pocket
4. Check if step counting is enabled
5. Restart iPhone if needed
6. Force refresh data

**Data Mismatches:**
• Different algorithms than Apple Health
• Normal to have small differences
• Check sync settings
• Force refresh data
• Verify HealthKit permissions

**Notification Issues:**
• Check notification permissions
• Ensure Do Not Disturb is off
• Restart app
• Check iOS notification settings
• Verify notification center

**Permission Problems:**
• Go to Settings > Privacy & Security
• Find Movic Steps in lists
• Enable all permissions
• Restart app after enabling
• Check HealthKit specifically

**App Crashes:**
• Force close and reopen
• Restart iPhone
• Update app if available
• Contact support with details
• Check available storage

**Duplicate Steps:**
• Check for multiple fitness apps
• Disable duplicate sources
• Restart app
• Check HealthKit settings

**Zero Values:**
• Verify permissions
• Check phone placement
• Restart app
• Force refresh data
• Contact support if persistent

**Contact Support:**
• Email: support@airforcerp.com
• Use AI Assistant in app
• Include device model and iOS version
• Describe steps to reproduce issue
• Attach screenshots if helpful

step_goals.response:
🎯 **Step Goals & Recommendations:**

**Popular Step Goals:**
• **5,000 steps**: Good for beginners
• **8,000 steps**: Moderate activity level
• **10,000 steps**: Classic daily target
• **12,000 steps**: Active lifestyle
• **15,000 steps**: Very active
• **20,000+ steps**: Elite fitness level

**How to Choose:**
• Start with your current average
• Increase by 1,000-2,000 weekly
• Consider your fitness level
• Listen to your body
• Adjust based on lifestyle

**Setting Your Goal:**
1. Go to Goals tab
2. Tap "Add New Goal"
3. Select "Steps" as goal type
4. Enter your target number
5. Choose daily, weekly, or monthly
6. Save your goal

**Goal Tips:**
• Start realistic and build up
• Track progress daily
• Celebrate milestones
• Adjust if too easy/hard
• Consider your schedule

**Motivation:**
• Use reminders
• Join challenges
• Share achievements
• Track streaks
• Set mini-goals

**Health Benefits:**
• Improved cardiovascular health
• Better mood and energy
• Weight management
• Stronger bones and muscles
• Better sleep quality

distance_goals.response:
📏 **Distance Goals:**

**Common Distance Goals:**
• **1-2 miles (1.6-3.2 km)**: Light activity
• **3-4 miles (4.8-6.4 km)**: Moderate activity
• **5-6 miles (8-9.6 km)**: Active lifestyle
• **7-8 miles (11.2-12.8 km)**: Very active
• **10+ miles (16+ km)**: Elite fitness

**Setting Distance Goals:**
1. Go to Goals tab
2. Tap "Add New Goal"
3. Select "Distance" as goal type
4. Enter target distance
5. Choose unit (miles/km)
6. Set frequency (daily/weekly/monthly)
7. Save your goal

**Distance Tips:**
• Start with achievable targets
• Consider your walking pace
• Factor in time available
• Include all walking activities
• Track progress consistently

**Conversion Help:**
• 1 mile = 1.6 kilometers
• 1 kilometer = 0.62 miles
• 10,000 steps ≈ 5 miles (8 km)
• 5,000 steps ≈ 2.5 miles (4 km)

**Motivation:**
• Use distance challenges
• Track weekly totals
• Celebrate milestones
• Share achievements
• Join walking groups

**Health Benefits:**
• Improved cardiovascular fitness
• Better joint health
• Increased endurance
• Weight management
• Mental health benefits

calorie_goals.response:
🔥 **Calorie Goals:**

**Calorie Goal Guidelines:**
• **200-300 calories**: Light activity
• **400-500 calories**: Moderate activity
• **600-800 calories**: Active lifestyle
• **800-1000 calories**: Very active
• **1000+ calories**: Elite fitness

**Setting Calorie Goals:**
1. Go to Goals tab
2. Tap "Add New Goal"
3. Select "Calories" as goal type
4. Enter target calories
5. Choose frequency
6. Save your goal

**Calorie Calculation:**
• Based on walking speed
• Uses step length and distance
• Includes weight and height
• More accurate than generic estimates
• Enable "Use Calculated Metrics"

**Weight Loss Goals:**
• 1 lb = 3,500 calories
• Aim for 500-1000 calorie deficit daily
• Combine with healthy eating
• Track consistently
• Be patient with progress

**Calorie Tips:**
• Enable calculated metrics
• Update personal info
• Track consistently
• Combine with other activities
• Monitor trends over time

**Health Benefits:**
• Weight management
• Improved metabolism
• Better energy levels
• Cardiovascular health
• Mental clarity

**Accuracy Factors:**
• Walking speed
• Step length
• Body weight
• Movement intensity
• Terrain difficulty

active_minutes.response:
⏱️ **Active Minutes Goals:**

**Active Minutes Guidelines:**
• **30 minutes**: Minimum daily recommendation
• **45-60 minutes**: Good activity level
• **60-90 minutes**: Active lifestyle
• **90+ minutes**: Very active
• **150+ minutes**: Elite fitness

**Setting Active Minutes Goals:**
1. Go to Goals tab

• Stair climbing

• Sports activities
• Any movement that raises heart rate

**Calculation Method:**

• Uses step patterns and speed
• Includes heart rate data (if available)
• More accurate than time-based

app_permissions.response:
🔐 **App Permissions:**

**Required Permissions:**
• **Motion & Fitness**: Step counting
• **HealthKit**: Data sync
• **Notifications**: Goal reminders
• **Location** (optional): Distance tracking

**How to Enable:**
1. Go to iPhone Settings
2. Tap "Privacy & Security"
3. Find "Motion & Fitness"
4. Enable "Movic Steps"
5. Go to "Health" section
6. Enable all permissions for Movic Steps

**Motion & Fitness:**
• Required for step counting
• Uses iPhone's motion sensors
• Tracks walking and running
• No GPS required
• Works offline

**HealthKit Permissions:**
• **Read**: Steps, Distance, Calories
• **Write**: Steps, Distance, Calories
• Syncs with Apple Health
• Works with other apps
• Automatic data sharing

**Notification Permissions:**
• Goal reminders
• Achievement notifications
• Weekly reports
• Customizable alerts
• Can be disabled

**Location (Optional):**
• More accurate distance
• GPS-based tracking
• Battery usage consideration
• Can be disabled
• Still works without

**Privacy Protection:**
• All data stays on device
• No external sharing
• Apple's privacy standards
• You control permissions
• Transparent data use

**Troubleshooting:**
• Check all permissions
• Restart app after enabling
• Force close and reopen
• Contact support if issues
• Verify in Settings

language.response:
🌎 **App Language**

**Change the App’s Language**
• Open **Settings → Language** → choose your preferred language → tap **Apply**.  
• On iOS: You can also go to **iOS Settings → [App Name] → Preferred Language** to override the system language just for this app.  
• On Android (if applicable): **System Settings → Apps → [App Name] → Language**.

**What Changes**
• UI labels, menus, buttons, and most in-app copy.  
• Date, time, and number formats follow your chosen **Region/Locale**.  
• Some server-delivered content (e.g., support articles) may appear in English until translations are available.

**Auto vs Manual**
• **Follow System** (default): App matches your phone’s primary language.  
• **Manual Override**: Pick a different language in-app even if your phone is set to another language.

**Supported Languages**
• English (US), English (UK), Spanish, French, German, Italian, Portuguese (BR), Japanese, Korean, Chinese (Simplified), Chinese (Traditional), Arabic (RTL).  
• Don’t see yours? Tap **Request a Language** at the bottom of the Language screen.

**Accessibility & Input**
• Works with **VoiceOver/TalkBack**; screen reader texts follow your selected language where available.  
• Keyboard/input language is controlled by your OS keyboard settings. Add keyboards in **System Settings → General → Keyboard**.

**Right-to-Left (RTL) Support**
• Arabic/Hebrew UIs mirror layout for comfortable reading. If alignment looks off, restart the app after switching.

**Offline & Downloads**
• Language packs are lightweight. If you switch languages while offline, the change applies but some texts may fall back to English until the pack is cached.

**Troubleshooting**
1) Text looks like *gibberish* or mixed languages → Force close and reopen the app.  
2) Some screens didn’t change → Clear cache from **Settings → Storage** (no data loss).  
3) Dates/numbers look wrong → Set **Region/Locale** under **Settings → Language → Region**.  
4) Screen reader reads the wrong language → Check OS **Preferred Languages** order.  
5) Still stuck? Email **support@airforcerp.com** (include your device, OS version, and app version).

**Tip**
• After changing language or region, a quick app restart ensures every screen updates correctly.
